product_name: Icebreaker Oasis Crew Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: The men's Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Oasis crew underwear top is just what you'll want on those mornings that start out chilly and heat up as your activity increases. Merino wool wicks away moisture, breathes to regulate temperature and resists odors naturally. Fabric offers UPF 50+ protection from harmful UV rays. Flatlock seams reduce chafing, offset shoulder seams will not rub under backpack straps and side seams wrap towards the back to prevent hipbelt chafing. Extended hem increases coverage. The men's Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Oasis crew long underwear top has a slim fit. Machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade.
short_description: The men's Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Oasis crew underwear top is just what you'll want on those mornings that start out chilly and heat up as your activity increases.
